tool_description: Collects competitor pricing data and market conditions for specified products from various sources to inform pricing decisions.

product_ids.description: List of internal product identifiers to collect market data for

competitor_sources.description: List of competitor websites or data sources to monitor

data_freshness_hours.description: Maximum age of acceptable cached data in hours

error_messages: Invalid product IDs: One or more product identifiers are not recognized in the system.
Competitor source unavailable: Unable to access one or more specified competitor data sources.
Data collection timeout: Market data collection exceeded the maximum allowed time limit.
Invalid freshness parameter: data_freshness_hours must be between 1 and 168 hours.
usage: Provide product_ids and competitor_sources arrays to collect current market pricing data. Set data_freshness_hours to control how recent the data needs to be.

collection_timestamp.description: When the market data collection was completed

product_market_data.description: Market data summaries for each requested product

data_quality_score.description: Quality score of collected data from 0 to 100
